nodes.text: The Rajah was the ruling monarch of the planet Virujansi. The Rajah maintained a Royal Court, staffed with advisors. During the Galactic Civil War, the Rajah was targeted by the Galactic Empire, but the Alliance to Restore the Republic learned of the operation and spirited the Rajah and Royal Court to safety. Posing as the Rajah and his court, an Alliance team purposely got themselves incarcerated on the prison moon Captivity to rescue political prisoners.
